column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=After a long day of work , I was very sore and tired .
#id=2
#text=I had stood for five hours straight and was constantly helping customers on the ground floor .
#id=3
#text=Retail is difficult and it was painful for my feet because I often had to wear high heels everyday .
#id=4
#text=When I finally got home from work , I put my stuff down and began to change into more comfortable attire .
#id=5
#text=Once I did , I went to the bathroom and turned on the hot water to prepare my bath .
#id=6
#text=While that happened , I washed my face and took the makeup off my face .
#id=7
#text=Once I cleaned my face , I crawled into the shower and allowed the hot water to calm my body down and help me relax .
#id=8
#text=I put shampoo on my hair and washed my hair and massaged my scalp .
#id=9
#text=I then placed conditioner on my hair and lathered it all over my hair .
#text=I then washed it off and focused on washing my body .
#text=After washing my body , and rinsing off the soap suds , I simply let the hot water go all over my body and allowed it to help me relax .
